% https://q.uiver.app/?
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	&& \textcolor{rgb,255:red,92;green,214;blue,92}{\scriptsize \text{interversion } \lim / \int} \\
	{\text{CN sur I} \\ \scriptsize \color{blue} \sum \Vert f_n \Vert_\infty \text{ cvg}} && {\text{CU sur I}\\ \scriptsize \color{blue} \Vert f-f_n \Vert_{\infty,I} \xrightarrow[n \to \infty]{} 0 \\ \Vert R_n \Vert_\infty  \xrightarrow[n \to \infty]{} 0} && {\text{CS sur I}\\ \scriptsize \color{blue} \forall x \in I, f_n(x) / \sum f_n(x) \text{ cvg}} \\
	\\
	{\text{CN } \scriptsize \text{sur tout segment de I}} && {\text{CU } \scriptsize \text{sur tout segment de I}} && \textcolor{rgb,255:red,92;green,214;blue,92}{\scriptsize \text{positivité et monotonie}} \\
	&& \textcolor{rgb,255:red,92;green,214;blue,92}{\scriptsize \text{préserve } \mathscr{C}^0}
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=4-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[curve={height=18pt}, Rightarrow, from=4-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\scriptsize x \mapsto x^n \text{ sur } [0, 1[}"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, curve={height=12pt}, from=2-5, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\scriptsize \sum \frac{(-1)^n}{x + n} \text{ sur } [1, 2]}"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, curve={height=12pt}, from=2-3, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\scriptsize \sum \frac{x^n}{n!} \text{ sur } \mathbb{R}}"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, curve={height=12pt}, from=4-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\scriptsize x \mapsto x^n \text{ sur } [0, 1[}"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, curve={height=12pt}, from=4-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,92;green,214;blue,92}, curve={height=-12pt}, squiggly, from=2-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,92;green,214;blue,92}, squiggly, from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,92;green,214;blue,92}, squiggly, from=4-3, to=5-3]
\end{tikzcd}\]
